titles.title: A bill to ensure that oil transported through the Keystone XL pipeline into the United States is used to reduce United States dependence on Middle Eastern oil.
A bill to ensure that oil transported through the Keystone XL pipeline into the United States is used to reduce United States dependence on Middle Eastern oil.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
